channel.title: Wth! Can't make myself admin! WHY?
channel.description: When I go to characters page and open the .txt that came with the source, I change playerinmember=1 and playerrights=3 (so I can be owner right?) When I log in, I don't have a gold crown and if I log off and go back to characters page and open my .txt again it says playerismemb=1 BUT playerrights=0!! WTF someone help me please!

item.title: Wth! Can't make myself admin! WHY?
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

If your having a problem making yourself an admin maybe you should use a different source.

Read full topic

item.title: Wth! Can't make myself admin! WHY?
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“bower007, post:11, topic:218908”]I did!! Nothing!! It changes itself back… I tryed with other users too but nothing.
Don’t I have to compile when I change rights?[/quote]Try deleting the savedgames(Your player name).dat while in the middle of it.

Read full topic
item.source: Wth! Can't make myself admin! WHY?

item.title: Wth! Can't make myself admin! WHY?
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

    if (command.startsWith("giveowner") 
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yournameher")) {

        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 3;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": Has given admin to: " + command.substring(10);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    }

Read full topic

No, you don’t have to compile, because its a .txt file.
